mapper.select: select delivery_id as id, user_id as "user.id", delivery_name as name, delivery_recipient as recipient, delivery_phone as phone, delivery_address1 as address1, delivery_address2 as address2, delivery_zipcode as zipcode, delivery_memo as memo, delivery_default_yn as defaultYn from delivery where user_id = 4 order by delivery_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into delivery (user_id, delivery_name, delivery_recipient, delivery_phone, delivery_address1, delivery_address2, delivery_zipcode) values (4, #{name}, #{recipient}, #{phone}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{zipcode})
